articles.description: Oura’s latest study indicates that covid-19 can impact biometrics like temperature, heart rate, heart rate variability, and sleep up to 2.5 days before symptoms and for several weeks after.
articles.content:
Oura study shows covid-19 can impact your biometrics for weeks after infection
